A letter in answer to a book entitled, Christianity not mysterious as also, to all those who set up for reason and evidence in opposition to revelation & mysteries / by Peter Browne ... Browne, Peter, ca. 1666-1735.
[4], 231, [1] p.
Printed by Joseph Ray ... for John North ..., Dublin : 1697.
Errata: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in British Library.
